item.title: Trump says lax migration policies are top national security threat after National Guard members shot
item.description: President Donald Trump says Wednesday's attack on two National Guard members near the White House highlights the dangers of lax migration policies

item.title: Great Lakes region preparing for bad weather over lake-effect snowfall ingredients
item.description: Cold air is sweeping across the Great Lakes region, bringing lake-effect snow from Michigan's Upper Peninsula to Western New York

item.title: Louisiana death row inmate released on bail after decades behind bars

item.title: Higher fees for foreigners visiting US national parks stokes tourism concerns
item.description: A $100-per-person charge for foreigners entering Yellowstone, Grand Canyon and other popular national parks is stoking apprehension among some tourist...
